alert.note: Alert for New Hanover; Pender (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 27 at 1:52AM EDT until June 27 at 6:00AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 AM EDT FOR NEW HANOVER...eastern PENDER AND NORTHERN BRUNSWICK COUNTIES... At 151 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from New River Station to near Winnabow, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Wilmington, Leland, Burgaw, Wrightsville Beach, Surf City, Masonboro Island, Figure Eight Island, Hampstead, Northwest, Topsail Beach, Makatoka, AND Maple Hill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
